title: how to stop beta download
body: plz help want to stop the download have restarted computer and everything what do I do

replies.body: Stopping the  and restarting your PC like this could lead to your game files becoming corrupt or causing issues.  You can return to the legacy client manually through your League of Legends folder and selecting lol.launcher.  Keep in mind that this won't bypass any necessary updates that may be required, and in this case the possibility of a repair scan.  I hope that helps clear things up!
